general: Today, the moon in Pisces invites you to dive into your emotions. You will feel a strong need for connection with others and to express your creativity. The planetary influences suggest that intuition will be your best guide.
love: Dare to share your dreams and desires with your partner, it will strengthen your bond.
work: Your sensitivity can be a strength at work, listen to your colleagues and propose creative solutions to problems.
health: Take the time to recharge, a relaxing activity like meditation or yoga will do you good.
teaser: Listen to your heart and let yourself be guided.
